sentences.sContent: Nowadays many scholars think that the may4th culture conservatism serves for the idea of feudalism returning of the ancients and autarchy culture.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nowadays many scholars think that the may4th culture conservatism serves for the idea of feudalism returning of the ancients and autarchy culture.
sentences.sCn: 在当今学术界，许多学者对五四文化保守主义持批判的态度，认定其是为封建复古主义和专制文化服务的。

sentences.sContent: In this thesis, the author believes that the paradox of autarchy and democracy in American politics should not be a new thing only germinating and developing in recent eras.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this thesis, the author believes that the paradox of autarchy and democracy in American politics should not be a new thing only germinating and developing in recent eras.
sentences.sCn: 综上所述，本文作者认为，“杰克逊式民主”中表现出的专制与民主的矛盾与共存，是美国政治的传统与根源。
